title: A bigger share of bank deposits comes at higher rates now
description: Banks in India are offering higher interest rates on deposits to attract savers, with more than two-thirds of deposits earning 7% or above by June 2024. This shift is driven by the need to meet rising credit demand, which continues to outpace deposit growth.
